pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life force. If it is weak, the flame also burns weakly.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The pressurized water jets on this brutal Pokémon's shell are used for high-speed tackles.

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

pokemon.name: Metapod
pokemon.pokedex_entry: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.pokedex_entry: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.pokedex_entry: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.pokedex_entry: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.pokedex_entry: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

pokemon.name: Rattata
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If

pokemon.name: Raticate
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its sharp incisors can easily cut right through hard wood. It's a troublesome Pokémon that is often found in buildings and forests.

pokemon.name: Spearow
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.pokedex_entry: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

pokemon.name: Arbok
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.pokedex_entry: This intelligent Pokémon roasts hard berries with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

pokemon.name: Nidoran♀
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

pokemon.name: Nidoran♂
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.pokedex_entry: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the bones of its prey.

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

pokemon.name: Clefable
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

pokemon.name: Vulpix
pokemon.pokedex_entry: At the time of its birth, Vulpix has one white tail. The tail separates into six if this Pokémon receives plenty of love from its Trainer.

pokemon.name: Ninetales
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.pokedex_entry: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

pokemon.name: Dugtrio
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It has mystical powers but doesn't recall that it has. When it is confused, its power becomes stronger.

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.pokedex_entry: An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A legendary Pokémon in China. Many people are charmed by its grace and beauty while running.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.pokedex_entry: An adept swimmer, it knows the front crawl, butterfly, and more. It is faster than the best human swimmers.

pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Sleeps for 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close.

pokemon.name: Alakazam
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be around 5000.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.pokedex_entry: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this Pokémon fires off awesome punches.

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary mandrake plant.

pokemon.name: Weepinbell
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

pokemon.name: Victreebel
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it's exposed to air.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Slowpoke uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in water at the side of a river. However, this Pokémon often forgets what it's doing and often spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Slowbro's tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite. As a result, the tail can't be used for fishing anymore. This causes Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Magnemite floats in the air by emitting electromagnetic waves from the units at its sides. These waves block gravity. This Pokémon becomes incapable of flight if its internal electrical supply is depleted.

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Magneton emits a powerful magnetic force that is fatal to mechanical devices. As a result, large cities sound sirens to warn citizens of large-scale outbreaks of this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Farfetch'd
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Farfetch'd is always seen with a stick from a plant of some sort. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This Pokémon has been known to fight with others over sticks.

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its streamlined body has little drag in water. The colder the water, the more comfortable they are.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.pokedex_entry: The shell can withstand any attack. However, when it is open, the tender body is exposed.

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.pokedex_entry: By licking, it saps the victim's life. It causes shaking that won't stop until the victim's demise.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.pokedex_entry: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

pokemon.name: Kingler
pokemon.pokedex_entry: One claw grew massively and as hard as steel. It has 10,000-HP strength. However, it is too heavy.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.

pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its six eggs use telepathy to communicate among themselves. It is believed to carry plant genes and the genes of other species.

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A coconut palm tree that is more than 5,000 years old is still alive. Its slender white body is supported by two legs.

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this Pokémon's real face.

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Small and weak, this Pokémon is adept with its bone club. It has grown more vicious over the ages.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its legs freely contract and stretch. The grace and speed of its movements are beautiful to behold.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.pokedex_entry: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.pokedex_entry: If one gets close enough to it when it expels poisonous gas, the gas swirling inside it can be seen.

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It's said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It walks carefully to prevent its egg from breaking. Its soft, fluffy fur coat acts like a cloud.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its identity is obscured by masses of thick, blue vines. The vines are said to never stop growing.

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.pokedex_entry: If attacked by a larger enemy, it quickly swims to safety by adeptly controlling its dorsal fin.

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Touching the back fin causes numbness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It swims at a steady 5 knots. If it senses danger, it will strike back with its sharp horn.

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.pokedex_entry: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

pokemon.name: Staryu
pokemon.pokedex_entry: At night, the center of its body slowly flickers with the same rhythm as a human heartbeat.

pokemon.name: Starmie
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value it as a gem.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It uses the mysterious power it holds in the orbs on its hands to erase the memories of its enemies.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.pokedex_entry: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there are more than one.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When two Electabuzz meet, they rub the electric organs on their tails together to produce a high-voltage spark.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.pokedex_entry: In battle, it blows out intense flames from all over its body to intimidate its opponent.

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.pokedex_entry: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.pokedex_entry: This Pokémon is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for Tauros to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A pathetic excuse for a Pokémon that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It uses the mysterious power it holds in the orbs on its hands to erase the memories of its enemies.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.pokedex_entry: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there are more than one.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When two Electabuzz meet, they rub the electric organs on their tails together to produce a high-voltage spark.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.pokedex_entry: In battle, it blows out intense flames from all over its body to intimidate its opponent.

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.pokedex_entry: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.pokedex_entry: This Pokémon is not satisfied unless it is rampaging at all times. If there is no opponent for Tauros to battle, it will charge at thick trees and knock them down to calm itself.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A pathetic excuse for a Pokémon that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A gentle soul that can read the minds of humans. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Capable of transforming into an exact replica of its enemy, this Pokémon is considered one of the most difficult to catch.

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A unique Pokémon with the ability to evolve into different forms depending on its environment and training.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A sensitive Pokémon that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.pokedex_entry: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

pokemon.name: Omanyte
pokemon.pokedex_entry: An ancient Pokémon that was recovered from a fossil. It swam by cleverly twisting its 10 tentacles about.

pokemon.name: Omastar
pokemon.pokedex_entry: An ancient Pokémon that was resurrected from an Old Amber. It swam in ancient seas.

pokemon.name: Kabuto
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that was recovered from a fossil. It uses the eyes on its back while hiding on the sea floor.

pokemon.name: Kabutops
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A ferocious Pokémon that lived in ancient times. Its sharp claws were its greatest weapons.

pokemon.name: Aerodactyl
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its sharp fangs easily tear through flesh.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that loves to sleep. It eats over 900 pounds of food every day and has a calm demeanor.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.pokedex_entry: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It sheds its skin every year, and that skin is used to make medicines. Its meat is also considered a delicacy.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A mystical Pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. It is said to be capable of inducing rainfall.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.pokedex_entry: It can fly faster than the speed of sound. It's also incredibly strong—its wings can shear through thick trees.

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
pokemon.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon created by genetic manipulation. It is highly intelligent and wields immense psychic power.

pokemon.name: Mew
pokemon.pokedex_entry: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
